short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a personal AI assistant for your business development, marketing and other online research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Browser Assistant is an easy way to research prospects, companies, partners and really any other topic. Reduce repetition by presetting your key research goals and letting AI do the routine work while you browse.

Remember to configure your OpenAI or Perplexity key.

A note on privacy:
Broadmind Cloud Technologies does not store or process your data or your keys. All data is stored locally in your browser, and when using a public service such as OpenApi, the Assistant will communicate directly with these services. Be aware however that your requests are transmitted to their systems. Avoid entering sensitive information in the prompt or questions.

Contact us  to securely integrate the assistant with your company's internal data and applications (powered by https://www.websemaphore.com).
